DataElement.preferredName: Medication Addendum Question During Delayed Period Take Any Medication Except the Study Drug for Vomiting Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated indication of whether or not they took any medication for vomiting, except the study drug, on the second day during the first week of chemotherapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The sensation that one is about to vomit._The reflex act of ejecting the contents of the stomach through the mouth._An appendage to an existing document that contains supplemental information.
